archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Accept Order Handling Infrastructure
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modelled in business process terms, and can be applied (i.e. â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Testing and acceptance of new and/or modified customer order handling infrastructure as part of the handover procedure from the Marketing & Offer Management processes to Operations;
